column4: right guys i've messed up my xubuntu.  i've told it to do all the fancy shmancy things like mac osx.....but because my laptop can't do it its just cocked up, whenever something opens the APPLICATIONS/PLACES at the top can't be seen :(
window manager treaks no longer opens either :)

Once had that problem and went through several posts in ubuntuforums in search for an answer,only to find some user giving a link to a launchpad page describing it as a bug.Sorr dude,I know how it feel,dont loose hop thouh,some one might help fix
